From the end of FY2001 to the end of FY2015, total federal debt increased by $12,380 billion. Debt held in government accounts rose by $2,566 billion, and debt held by the public increased by $9,813 billion. Debt measures experienced periodic reductions despite an overall increasing trend due to uneven federal receipts and outlays.
